response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Considering its high value to you, we're extending an exclusive offer to purchase it for $120. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also the opportunity to secure it at a favorable rate compared to market prices. We're confident this investment will pay off in terms of both utility and potential long-term savings. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
